title: The $90 Billion Squeeze: What the Triad's Budget Really Means for Your Capture Strategy
description: Two massive funding streams converge as the Pentagon tears up its acquisition rulebook. The DHP budget meets the Rural Health Transformation Program—$90 billion catalyzing federal health IT.

title: The MHS Triad Part 2: The Capability Stack
description: H2F proves the doctrine works. The telehealth landscape they're inheriting. What it means for contractors, beneficiaries, and the warfighter.

title: The MHS Triad Part 1: Meet the Three Leaders Who Will Reshape Military Medicine
description: Keith Bass, Emil Michael, and Admiral Darin Via. The political architect, the Silicon Valley disruptor, and the operational commander.

title: Department of War: What the Name Change Actually Means
description: Defense.gov now redirects to war.gov. This isn't just optics—it's doctrine. The metric of success is no longer patient satisfaction.

title: The Audit Mandate: Why Everything Has to Work Now
description: DoD must achieve a clean audit opinion by December 31, 2028. Section 1002 of the FY2026 NDAA gives this mandate real teeth.

title: The Oura Disaster: Lessons from a $96M Sole-Source Collapse
description: The wearables deal didn't die because WHOOP filed a protest. It died because DHA couldn't audit the data.

title: Human Performance Optimization: Via's Doctrine Made Real
description: The Human Weapon System. Cognitive enhancement. Nutritional optimization. Sleep resilience. This isn't healthcare—it's maintaining combat power.

title: GenAI.mil: AI is America's Next Manifest Destiny
description: Emil Michael launched GenAI.mil, putting Google's Gemini for Government on every DoD desktop. 3 million users at every classification level.
